metadata.title: Goongoom - Anonymous Q&A Platform
metadata.description: Ask questions and get answers anonymously

auth.loginRequired: Please log in to send a question.
auth.welcomeDescription: Log in to send and receive anonymous questions

passkey.setupError: An error occurred while setting up passkey. Please try again.
passkey.setupCompleteDescription: You can now log in faster and more securely.
passkey.nudgeTitle: What if someone answers without permission?
passkey.nudgeDescription: Log in faster and more securely with Face ID or Touch ID
passkey.fasterDescription:
Log in with Face ID, fingerprint, or device lock
with just one touch.

share.title: Share
share.easyShareDescription: Share your link on Instagram, Twitter, anywhere. Get questions with just one click.
share.instagramShareDescription: Save witty answers as images and share them directly to Instagram Stories and feeds.

questions.whoToAsk: How do you want to ask?
questions.termsAgreement: By asking, you agree to our terms of service

settings.title: Settings
settings.anonymousRestrictionDescription: Restrict anonymous questions to reduce malicious messages.
settings.profileSettingsDescription: Set your profile info and social links.
settings.accountSettingsDescription: Manage your username, phone number, and security settings.

home.heroDescription:
Ask anonymously, answer honestly.
Share your profile and hear your friends' true thoughts.
home.safeAnonymityDescription: Questioners' identities are kept strictly anonymous. Start honest conversations without pressure.

questionSecurity.anyoneDescription: Non-members can also send anonymous questions.
questionSecurity.verifiedLabel: Allow anonymous only from verified users
questionSecurity.verifiedDescription: Only users with verified phone numbers can send anonymous questions. Goongoom will not share questioner information without a legal request.

restrictions.anonymousLoginRequired: Anonymous questions require login. Your identity won't be revealed unless required by law.
restrictions.identifiedOnly: This user only accepts identified questions.
restrictions.loginForIdentified: Log in to send identified questions.

errors.publicQuestionLoginRequired: Login required to send public questions
errors.publicQuestionOnly: This user only accepts public questions
errors.anonymousLoginRequired: Login required to send anonymous questions
errors.questionIdAndContentRequired: Question ID and content are required
errors.onlyRecipientCanAnswer: Only the recipient can answer this question

a2hs.title: Add to Home Screen
a2hs.description:
Access instantly like an app
and get notifications.
